name: Up The Well
description:
Up The Well

Little Timmy fell down the well! But no worries, he can swim! To save him, we just have to add water!

This game was made in two days for the MMarmalade 3 gamejam. The theme was 'Just add Water'

TEAMEverything - Maximilian Tomio

CONTROLS

KeyAction A / Left
Move LeftD / Right
Move Right
Space
Dash
S / Down
Dive

  • Avoid the spikes on the walls! Touching them means you'll have to start over.
  • To dash, move either left or right & press Space. Be careful not to dash into spikes!
  • The little monsters gazing out of the wall are called 'Wallbiters', if you get too close they'll attempt to take a bite out of you! Stay away from them!
  • You can dodge the Wallbiters by getting close and diving down after triggering their bite, allowing you to go through before they can bite again!

The background music is royalty-free music from https://www.fesliyanstudios.com.
The tileset used is Cavernas by Adam Saltsman.
